title: Vaccines, Impeachment, Rep. Maloney
itunes:title: Vaccines, Impeachment, Rep. Maloney
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy. “Guests: Rick Davis, Bloomberg contributor, Roger Fisk, Democratic Strategist; long time President Obama aide and Principal of New Day Strategy, Rep. Carolyn Maloney, A New York Democrat representing NY's 12th congressional district

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
